Assign population attributable fractions to diseases

assignPAFs.Rd

Look at the data fields generated by running [hesr::findEpisodes()] and create a parallel set of data fields containing the corresponding population attributable fractions.

assignPAFs(
  data,
  paf_data = hesr::paf_data,
  paf_strat = c("ageband", "sex", "imd_quintile"),
  col_name_vec = c("diag_01")
)

Arguments

data

Data table - episode-level hospital episode statistics data.

paf_data

Data table - the population attributable fractions to be assigned to diseases.

paf_strat

Character vector - the variables by which the population attributable fractions are stratified.

col_name_vec

Character vector - The name of the diagnosis code columns scanned to identify target disease diagnosis codes.

Value

Returns the input episode-level hospital episode statistics data with new columns added for the population attributable fractions that correspond to the tobacco and/or alcohol related diseases identified in each of the diagnosis columns.

Details

Population attributable fractions can be stratified by "year", sex", "ageband" and/or "imd_quintile".

Examples

if (FALSE) {


}
